statements: SELECT * FROM network_congestion_prediction
SELECT id, date, network_status, resource_usage FROM network_congestion_prediction
SELECT id, network_status, resource_usage, date FROM network_congestion_prediction
SELECT * FROM network_congestion_prediction WHERE resource_usage > 100
SELECT id, network_status FROM network_congestion_prediction WHERE date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM network_congestion_prediction WHERE resource_usage > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, date FROM network_congestion_prediction WHERE network_status = 'Critical' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, resource_usage, network_status FROM network_congestion_prediction ORDER BY resource_usage DESC, id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM network_congestion_prediction
SELECT TOP 5 id, network_status FROM network_congestion_prediction ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM network_congestion_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, congestion_level FROM network_congestion_data WHERE data_volume > 1000;
SELECT id, timestamp, data_volume FROM network_congestion_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation;
SELECT id, timestamp, resource_name, allocated_capacity FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_capacity < 500;
SELECT * FROM network_congestion_data WHERE data_volume > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, congestion_level FROM network_congestion_data WHERE congestion_level = 'High'
SELECT data_volume, congestion_level FROM network_congestion_data WHERE congestion_level = 'Low' ORDER BY data_volume ASC
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT timestamp, resource_name FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_name LIKE '%server%'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE congestion_level > 5;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM resource_allocation ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, allocated_memory, allocated_bandwidth FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_memory > 10 AND allocated_bandwidth < 20;
SELECT id, timestamp, predicted_congestion_level FROM congestion_prediction WHERE optimization_strategy = 'Optimize';
SELECT timestamp, data_usage FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY data_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE congestion_level = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, allocated_memory FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_bandwidth > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT id, timestamp, predicted_congestion_level, optimization_strategy FROM congestion_prediction WHERE predicted_congestion_level >= 2 AND optimization_strategy LIKE '%cost%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, timestamp, data_usage FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND data_usage < 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM congestion_prediction WHERE optimization_strategy = 'Latency' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, network_traffic FROM historical_data WHERE network_traffic > 1000;
SELECT id, date, latency FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM congestion_prediction WHERE predicted_congestion < 50;
SELECT id, device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Headquarters';
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT network_traffic, latency FROM historical_data WHERE network_traffic > 1000 AND latency < 50;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT date, predicted_congestion, resource_allocated FROM congestion_prediction WHERE predicted_congestion > 75 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, optimized_resource_allocation FROM resource_optimization ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT record_id, date, network_usage FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, status FROM network_devices WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, bytes_transferred FROM network_traffic WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT prediction_id, timestamp, predicted_congestion FROM congestion_predictions ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT network_devices.device_name, network_traffic.bytes_transferred, historical_data.date FROM network_devices INNER JOIN network_traffic ON network_devices.device_id = network_traffic.device_id INNER JOIN historical_data ON historical_data.date = network_traffic.timestamp ORDER BY network_traffic.bytes_transferred DESC;
SELECT prediction_id, timestamp, predicted_congestion FROM congestion_predictions WHERE predicted_congestion IN ('High', 'Medium') ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_name, location, is_active FROM network_devices WHERE status = 'OK' AND is_active = true;
SELECT COUNT(rec.record_id) AS total_records, AVG(rec.network_usage) AS avg_usage FROM historical_data rec JOIN network_devices dev ON rec.record_id = dev.device_id;
